PrisonerInteractionModeDef.label: ripscan
PrisonerInteractionModeDef.description: A warden will carry this prisoner to a Subcore Ripscanner to be ripscanned. The prisoner will die in the process, which may make pawns somewhat unhappy.

PrisonerInteractionModeDef.label: softscan
PrisonerInteractionModeDef.description: A warden will carry this prisoner to a Subcore Softscanner to be softscanned.
